body_html:
I think it is still not resolved right now. As in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/upsampling.py

def __init__(self, size=None, scale_factor=None):
    super(UpsamplingBilinear2d, self).__init__(size, scale_factor, mode='bilinear', align_corners=True)

You cannot pass the align_corners parameters to UpsamplingBilinear2d(). Should add a parameter here to fix it. I already created a new pull request.

body:
I think it is still not resolved right now. As in [https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/upsampling.py](url)
```python
def __init__(self, size=None, scale_factor=None):
    super(UpsamplingBilinear2d, self).__init__(size, scale_factor, mode='bilinear', align_corners=True)
```
You cannot pass the align_corners parameters to UpsamplingBilinear2d(). Should add a parameter here to fix it. I already created a new pull request.
